content: please feel free to substitute for your favorite style rounded toe *k6 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k3 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round k1 row *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round *k2tog* repeat to end of round there 8 stitches left cut yarn and gather the stitches together to close the opening weave in all your ends block as desired no kitchener stitch needed abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together ws wrong side p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place stitch marker ssk slip slip knit co cast on p purl pu pick up k knit - - purl p purl o yarn over sl slip / - k2tog rs right side \ - ssk pattern & photography by olivia villarreal for personal use only pattern support email olive villarreal@yahoo com
